Articles.Content:
I hope that you can help

I just upgraded to version 0.25 of KSP and I also have gone throgh and updated all my MODS that would

allow me to continue to play with my current ships, but I have run into a wall

after the game loads up, the whole thing will crash after about 2 mins, or less with is a pain in the ass

I think it is the Mods in the Parts folder, but the issue is that I have a lot of ships that uses the parts, and I can't find the updated version for this

I have attach the crash logs to the post, in the hope that someone can help.

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/cx5smso2ms9qm9l/AAA_iU4FVa0GA5jfdwyb2TKCa?dl=0

Edited December 26, 2014 by chrischambers
